Shape - Interface in poo
Shape is the interface that defines the different shapes that will be able to follow the paths.
Shapes - package Shapes
 
Square - Class in Shapes
Square is the class representing a shape in the form of square.
Square() - Constructor for class Shapes.Square
Constructor initiating an instance of square with a rotation angle of 0.
